info MAE: Equivalent Shutdown Modules. Each detected thermal abnormality has an associated energy loss. The ESM quantifies the sum of these accumulated losses in the plant.
info Potencia reparable: Equivalent power of the abnormalities we have catalogued as repairable.
info num Anoms: No. of filtered anomalies / No. of total anomalies
Configura el PDF como prefieras: Configure the PDF as you prefer
Selecciona destino 1: After requesting the PDF, when it is generated you will receive an email to the email address with which you have logged in.
Selecciona destino 2: If you prefer to receive it to another email address, activate the following box and enter the one you prefer.
PDF solicitado 1: You will soon receive an email with a link to download your PDF.
PDF solicitado 2: As you have selected the section that includes images of the abnormalities, keep in mind that the time could be extended if the number of anomalies is high.
PDF solicitado 3: You can continue using the application without any problem.
PDF solicitado 4: As you have selected the section that includes images of the trackers, keep in mind that the time could be extended if the number of trackers is high.
Para visualizar dónde están los problema: To visualize where the performance problems are
Encuentra la relación entre el tipo de a: Find the relationship between the type of abnormality and the losses it causes
Subtitulo grafico altura: If the distribution is not uniform, it may mean problems related to vegetation or bird droppings
Módulos con cel. calientes por gradiente: Modules with heated cells by gradient
Clasificación de los módulos con céls ca: Classification of the modules with heated cells by gradient
Para visualizar dónde se generan las cél: To visualize where the heated cells are generated
Módulo en string con baja producción: Module in string with low production
Predicción evolución número de anomalías: Prediction of evolution of number of abnormalities
Predicción de la evolución de las anomal: Prediction of the evolution of the abnormalities by type and its associated ESM
Hemos enviado un email para restablecer: We have sent an email to reset your password. Check your email.
La diferencia de temperatura aumenta con: The temperature difference increases with the current. Normally caused by broken cells. It can lead to irreversible damage to the cell, insulation or bypass diode.
Diodo bypass actuando en el módulo. Pued: Bypass diode acting in the module. It may be due to one or more hot cells producing the diode to activate. It can also be due to a connection problem between cells or defective bypass diode.
Los módulos que componen el string se en: The modules that make up the string are at a temperature several degrees higher than the normal operating temperature of the module. It is possible that the string is in open circuit.
Problema de conexión entre células o dio: Connection problem between cells or defective bypass diode. It can lead to a visible series arc on the back surface of the module.
Posible subida repentina de tensión o de: Possible sudden rise in voltage or manufacturing defect.
La suciedad habitual (tierra o deposicio: The usual dirt (earth or bird droppings) usually disappears with the rain.
Puede haber sido causado por una célula: It may have been caused by a high temperature cell.
Existe un calentamiento anómalo en una o: There is an anomalous heating in one or several of the connections between cells of the module.
La temperatura aumenta con la carga de c: The temperature increases with the current load caused by the increase in electrical resistance inside the junction box. It can also be caused by a broken tape or a defective welding point between the cross connector and the tape.
Existe algún elemento que está provocand: There is some element that is causing shadows that prevent the correct operation of the affected module or modules.
Suelen aparecer por defectos en la fabri: They usually appear due to manufacturing defects. It does not usually affect the performance of the module.
The module suffers from PID in early phase.
The module is missing in this position.
The module suffers from PID of regular type.
El módulo sufre de PID de tipo irregular: The module suffers from PID of irregular type.
Ver si no hay sombras o suciedad: Check for any shadows or dirt
Revisar módulos, estado de operación del: Inspect modules, inverter operating status, wiring, connectors, and fuses.
Revisar módulo en campo para determinar: Examine field module to determine cause.
Revisar módulo y diodos bypass para un c: Check module and bypass diodes for proper reverse polarity operation.
Tener en cuenta que el voltage aumenta d: Note that voltage increases due to insulation loss.
Cambiar el diodo bypass en caso de que s: Change the bypass diode if it is the cause.
Se recomienda la limpieza del módulo si: It is recommended to clean the module if rain is not expected soon, in order to prevent damage to the module.
Tener cuidado con las subidas de voltaje: Be cautious of voltage spikes due to insulation losses from high temperatures.
MAE que solo tiene en cuenta las anomalí: ESM that only takes into account the abnormalities that are fixable
